rule: The response should contain more than the tag corresponding to the part of speech of the given word with additional text.
input: sentence: Breakfast is ready., word: Breakfast
validityText:
The input sentence "Breakfast is ready." appears to be a valid English sentence; it includes alphabets, spaces, and allowed punctuation.

The input word "Breakfast" is a single continuous string of characters without spaces and it is present in the given sentence.

OK
